title: How to unblock website notifications?
content: I've accidentally blocked notifications on a website that I cannot use without its notifications. There doesn't seem to be any way to undo this in the notifications settings, and I'm at a loss.
creator: nlibowitz

title: Firefox Web images
content: Is there a reason so many web page images are blank on Firefox but display on Chrome?

title: How Do I Shrink Recent Bookmarks Dropdown List?
content: How Do I Shrink Recent Bookmarks Dropdown ListÂ ? I don't NEED or WANT to see a list of ALL my "RECENT" (unorganized) bookmarks. I can't find an option to activate the "dropdown" function in either main preferences or menu customizing. If I "remove" them from the list, they are also removed from where they were saved as a bookmark. If the answer is, "This can't be done.", then I am DONE WITH FIREFOX.
creator: n.e.flatlander
